ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c="1 - NEW", BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c="9 – APPROVED", BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c="CLOSED/NO CONTACT", BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c="REJECTED"), PRIORVALUE( BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c )="3 – IN PROGRESS" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 2 - ASSIGNED, 4 – WAITING FOR CLIENT, 5 - WAITING FOR 3RD PARTY, 7 – ON HOLD, 8 - RESOLVED, CANCELLED, or CLOSED are the only allowable status changes from 3 – IN PROGRESS.
